name: Shoot Bubbles 9
description:
Shoot Bubbles is exciting shooter game! Defeat the greedy stone man in this great shooter!
shoot bubbles and match colors to crush your way to victory! Unlock these exciting and challenging levels.
The levels seem easy, come and win 3 stars. Use shooting line and boosters to get a higher score.
Exciting Features
Match three or more cute and lovely bubbles to complete Shoot Bubbleslevel!
Match as much as you can before you run out of move!
Easy to play, but challenge to master!
Over 999+ magical levels and challenges in Shoot Bubbles for endless FUN!
download the best match 3 game for free! Have fun!
awesome and addictive puzzles!
